body:
Day 42 - 260*
I'm here, once again, to change my rating. At the time, I didn't have the knowledge that I have now and this was like an oasis in the desert. After watching camel by camel pass, I finally found some water. This was horrendous and, while the translation was really funny, that doesn't make this any better.
1/10.
Not sure what the fuck I read since I'm still baffled after the re-take series 5/10
Criminally underrated. Such a shame that after almost 7 years, I'm the first person making a comment.
